languages.text: "Ах!.." {n}Кассия вздрагивает, прикрывая глаза ладонью.{/n} "Мертвенный свет тассерция... повсюду — пропитал его душу, стал его цветом, его сутью..."

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Мое око! Как больно... Этот мертвенный свет тассерция повсюду — пропитал его душу, стал его цветом, его сутью..."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ah!" {n}Cassia flinches and shields her eyes with her hand.{/n} "The deathly light of thassertium... It is all around him, permeating his soul, melding into his colour, his essence..."
languages.original_text: "Ах!.." {n}Кассия вздрагивает, прикрывая глаза ладонью.{/n} "Мертвенный свет тассерция... повсюду — пропитал его душу, стал его цветом, его сутью..."

languages.text: "Ah!" {n}Cassia zuckt zusammen und bedeckt ihre Augen mit der Handfläche.{/n} "Das tödliche Licht von Thassertim ... Es umgibt ihn vollständig, dringt in seine Seele ein, verschmilzt mit seiner Farbe, seiner Essenz ..."
languages.original_text: "Ah!" {n}Cassia flinches and shields her eyes with her hand.{/n} "The deathly light of thassertium... It is all around him, permeating his soul, melding into his colour, his essence..."

traits.locale_text: "Ah!" {n}Cassia zuckt zusammen und bedeckt ihre Augen mit der Handfläche.{/n} "Das tödliche Licht von Thassertim ... Es umgibt ihn vollständig, dringt in seine Seele ein, verschmilzt mit seiner Farbe, seiner Essenz ..."

languages.text: « Ah ! » {n}Cassia frémit et couvre ses yeux d'une main.{/n} « La lumière mortelle du thassertium... Elle l'enveloppe, elle imprègne son âme, se fond dans sa couleur, son essence... »
languages.original_text: "Ah!" {n}Cassia flinches and shields her eyes with her hand.{/n} "The deathly light of thassertium... It is all around him, permeating his soul, melding into his colour, his essence..."

traits.locale_text: « Ah ! » {n}Cassia frémit et couvre ses yeux d'une main.{/n} « La lumière mortelle du thassertium... Elle l'enveloppe, elle imprègne son âme, se fond dans sa couleur, son essence... »

languages.text: “啊！”{n}卡西娅退了一步，遮住了眼睛。{/n}“塔瑟拉水晶的死亡之光……缠绕着他的全身，渗进了他的灵魂，融入了他的颜色、他的本质……”
languages.original_text: "Ah!" {n}Cassia flinches and shields her eyes with her hand.{/n} "The deathly light of thassertium... It is all around him, permeating his soul, melding into his colour, his essence..."

traits.locale_text: “啊！”{n}卡西娅退了一步，遮住了眼睛。{/n}“塔瑟拉水晶的死亡之光……缠绕着他的全身，渗进了他的灵魂，融入了他的颜色、他的本质……”
“啊！”{n}卡西娅退了一步，捂住了眼睛。{/n}“塔瑟拉水晶的死亡之光……缠绕着他的全身，渗进了他的灵魂，融入了他的颜色、他的本质……”

languages.text: «¡Ah!». {n}Cassia se encoge y se cubre los ojos con la mano.{/n} «La luz letal del thassertio... lo rodea por todas partes, inundando su alma, fundiéndose en su color, su esencia...».
languages.original_text: "Ah!" {n}Cassia flinches and shields her eyes with her hand.{/n} "The deathly light of thassertium... It is all around him, permeating his soul, melding into his colour, his essence..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ah!». {n}Cassia se encoge y se cubre los ojos con la mano.{/n} «La luz letal del thassertio... lo rodea por todas partes, inundando su alma, fundiéndose en su color, su esencia...».

languages.text: 「ああ！」{n}カシアは身をすくめ、手で目を覆った。{/n}「タッセリウムの死の光が…彼の周囲に満ちています。魂にまで染み込み、彼の色、彼の本質と溶け合ってしまっています…」
languages.original_text: "Ah!" {n}Cassia flinches and shields her eyes with her hand.{/n} "The deathly light of thassertium... It is all around him, permeating his soul, melding into his colour, his essence..."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ！」{n}カシアは身をすくめ、手で目を覆った。{/n}「タッセリウムの死の光が…彼の周囲に満ちています。魂にまで染み込み、彼の色、彼の本質と溶け合ってしまっています…」

languages.text: "Ah!" {n}Cassia, irkilip eliyle gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "Tasertiyumun ölümcül ışığı... Her yerini sarmış, ruhuna nüfuz etmiş... Rengine, özüne karışmış."
languages.original_text: "Ah!" {n}Cassia flinches and shields her eyes with her hand.{/n} "The deathly light of thassertium... It is all around him, permeating his soul, melding into his colour, his essence..."

traits.locale_text: "Ah!" {n}Cassia irkiliyor ve eliyle gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "Tasertiyum'un ölümcül ışığı... Her yerini sarmış, ruhuna nüfuz etmiş, rengine, özüne karışmış..."
